remarks: Lemma for ~ resubdrg and friends.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2014.)
statement:
cnsubglem.1 $e |- ( x e. A -> x e. CC ) $.
cnsubglem.2 $e |- ( ( x e. A /\ y e. A ) -> ( x + y ) e. A ) $.
cnsubglem.3 $e |- ( x e. A -> -u x e. A ) $.
cnsubglem.4 $e |- B e. A $.
cnsubglem $p |- A e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) $.
$d A x y $.
